description.brief: Streaming of OptiTrack mocap data to tf
description.p: This package contains a node that translates motion capture data from an OptiTrack rig to tf transforms. The node receives the binary packages that are streamed by the Arena software, decodes them and broadcasts the poses of rigid bodies as tf transforms.
Currently, this node supports the NatNet streaming protocol v1.4.
